source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View aie_document_data is created

%%sql
/* Need to create a view of both net new and changed records. For this feed the PK is a composite key of:

- DocumentID
- Version
- Mime

When we're looking for records to process we need to consider three groups:

1. Net new records
2. Updates to records that we've seen before but have isActive set to 'N' incorrectly
3. Updates to records that we've seen before, but are a net new version
4. Updates to records that isActive is set to 'Y' but it should be set to 'N' based on the latest data 

*/
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW aie_document_data_input
AS
WITH Latest
AS
(
    SELECT
        MAX(ingested_datetime) AS LatestDate
    FROM 
        odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data

)
--1. net new records
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS INT) AS AIEDocumentDataID
    ,standard.documentid AS DocumentID
    ,standard.caseref AS CaseReference
    ,standard.documentreference AS DocumentReference
    ,standard.version AS Version
    ,standard.examinationrefno AS ExaminationRefNo
    ,standard.filename AS FileName
    ,standard.originalfilename AS OriginalFileName
    ,standard.size AS Size
    ,standard.mime AS Mime
    ,standard.documenturi AS DocumentURI
    ,standard.path AS Path
    ,standard.viruscheckstatus AS VirusCheckStatus
    ,standard.filemd5 AS FileMD5
    ,IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'00/00/0000 00:00:00')	AS DateCreated
    ,standard.lastmodified AS LastModified
    ,standard.casetype AS CaseType
    ,standard.documentstatus AS DocumentStatus
    ,standard.redactedstatus AS RedactedStatus
    ,standard.publishedstatus AS PublishedStatus
    ,standard.datepublished AS DatePublished
    ,standard.documenttype AS DocumentType	
    ,standard.securityclassification AS SecurityClassification
    ,standard.sourcesystem AS SourceSystem
    ,standard.origin AS Origin
    ,standard.owner AS Owner
    ,standard.author AS Author
    ,standard.representative AS Representative
    ,standard.description AS Description
    ,standard.stage AS Stage
    ,standard.filter1 AS Filter1
    ,standard.filter2 AS Filter2
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,source_system.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(standard.expected_from) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(standard.documentid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.caseref,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.examinationrefno,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filename,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.originalfilename,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.size,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.mime,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documenturi,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.path,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filemd5,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.lastmodified,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.casetype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documentstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.redactedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.securityclassification,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.origin,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.owner,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.stage	,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filter2,'.')
        )) AS RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'Y' AS IsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS source_system
    INNER JOIN Latest
        ON source_system.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND source_system.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data AS standard
        ON Latest.LatestDate = standard.ingested_datetime
    LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AS Target
        ON standard.documentID = Target.documentID
        AND standard.Version = Target.Version
        AND standard.Mime = Target.Mime
WHERE
    Target.documentID IS NULL
UNION
--2. Updates to records that exist but are incorrectly set to 'N' for isActive
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS INT) AS AIEDocumentDataID
    ,standard.documentid AS DocumentID
    ,standard.caseref AS CaseReference
    ,standard.documentreference AS DocumentReference
    ,standard.version AS Version
    ,standard.examinationrefno AS ExaminationRefNo
    ,standard.filename AS FileName
    ,standard.originalfilename AS OriginalFileName
    ,standard.size AS Size
    ,standard.mime AS Mime
    ,standard.documenturi AS DocumentURI
    ,standard.path AS Path
    ,standard.viruscheckstatus AS VirusCheckStatus
    ,standard.filemd5 AS FileMD5
    ,IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'00/00/0000 00:00:00')	AS DateCreated
    ,standard.lastmodified AS LastModified
    ,standard.casetype AS CaseType
    ,standard.documentstatus AS DocumentStatus
    ,standard.redactedstatus AS RedactedStatus
    ,standard.publishedstatus AS PublishedStatus
    ,standard.datepublished AS DatePublished
    ,standard.documenttype AS DocumentType	
    ,standard.securityclassification AS SecurityClassification
    ,standard.sourcesystem AS SourceSystem
    ,standard.origin AS Origin
    ,standard.owner AS Owner
    ,standard.author AS Author
    ,standard.representative AS Representative
    ,standard.description AS Description
    ,standard.stage AS Stage
    ,standard.filter1 AS Filter1
    ,standard.filter2 AS Filter2
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,source_system.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(standard.expected_from) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(standard.documentid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.caseref,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.examinationrefno,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filename,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.originalfilename,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.size,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.mime,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documenturi,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.path,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filemd5,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.lastmodified,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.casetype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documentstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.redactedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.securityclassification,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.origin,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.owner,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.stage	,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filter2,'.')
        )) AS RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'Y' AS IsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS source_system
    INNER JOIN Latest
        ON source_system.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND source_system.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data AS standard
        ON Latest.LatestDate = standard.ingested_datetime
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AS Target
        ON standard.documentID = Target.documentID
        AND standard.Version = Target.Version
        AND standard.Mime = Target.Mime
        AND Target.IsActive = 'N'
        AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(standard.documentid,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.caseref,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documentreference,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.version,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.examinationrefno,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filename,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.originalfilename,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.size,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.mime,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documenturi,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.path,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filemd5,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.lastmodified,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.casetype,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documentstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.redactedstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.publishedstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.datepublished,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documenttype,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.securityclassification,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.sourcesystem,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.origin,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.owner,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.author,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.representative,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.description,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.stage	,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filter1,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filter2,'.')
                )) = Target.RowID
UNION
--3. Existing records with a new update
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS INT) AS AIEDocumentDataID
    ,standard.documentid AS DocumentID
    ,standard.caseref AS CaseReference
    ,standard.documentreference AS DocumentReference
    ,standard.version AS Version
    ,standard.examinationrefno AS ExaminationRefNo
    ,standard.filename AS FileName
    ,standard.originalfilename AS OriginalFileName
    ,standard.size AS Size
    ,standard.mime AS Mime
    ,standard.documenturi AS DocumentURI
    ,standard.path AS Path
    ,standard.viruscheckstatus AS VirusCheckStatus
    ,standard.filemd5 AS FileMD5
    ,IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'00/00/0000 00:00:00')	AS DateCreated
    ,standard.lastmodified AS LastModified
    ,standard.casetype AS CaseType
    ,standard.documentstatus AS DocumentStatus
    ,standard.redactedstatus AS RedactedStatus
    ,standard.publishedstatus AS PublishedStatus
    ,standard.datepublished AS DatePublished
    ,standard.documenttype AS DocumentType	
    ,standard.securityclassification AS SecurityClassification
    ,standard.sourcesystem AS SourceSystem
    ,standard.origin AS Origin
    ,standard.owner AS Owner
    ,standard.author AS Author
    ,standard.representative AS Representative
    ,standard.description AS Description
    ,standard.stage AS Stage
    ,standard.filter1 AS Filter1
    ,standard.filter2 AS Filter2
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,source_system.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(standard.expected_from) AS IngestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(standard.documentid,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.caseref,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.examinationrefno,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filename,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.originalfilename,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.size,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.mime,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documenturi,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.path,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filemd5,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.lastmodified,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.casetype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documentstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.redactedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.securityclassification,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.origin,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.owner,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.stage	,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(standard.filter2,'.')
        )) AS RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'Y' AS IsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS source_system
    INNER JOIN Latest
        ON source_system.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND source_system.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data AS standard
        ON Latest.LatestDate = standard.ingested_datetime
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AS Target
        ON standard.documentID = Target.documentID
        AND standard.Version = Target.Version
        AND standard.Mime = Target.Mime
        AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(standard.documentid,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.caseref,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documentreference,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.version,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.examinationrefno,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filename,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.originalfilename,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.size,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.mime,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documenturi,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.path,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filemd5,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.lastmodified,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.casetype,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documentstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.redactedstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.publishedstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.datepublished,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documenttype,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.securityclassification,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.sourcesystem,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.origin,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.owner,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.author,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.representative,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.description,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.stage	,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filter1,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filter2,'.')
                )) <> Target.RowID
UNION
-- 4. Old records that need to have isActive set to 'N'
SELECT
    Target.AIEDocumentDataID
    ,Target.DocumentID 
    ,Target.CaseReference
    ,Target.DocumentReference
    ,Target.Version
    ,Target.ExaminationRefNo
    ,Target.FileName
    ,Target.OriginalFileName
    ,Target.Size
    ,Target.Mime
    ,Target.DocumentURI
    ,Target.Path
    ,Target.VirusCheckStatus
    ,Target.FileMD5
    ,Target.DateCreated
    ,Target.LastModified
    ,Target.CaseType
    ,Target.DocumentStatus
    ,Target.RedactedStatus
    ,Target.PublishedStatus
    ,Target.DatePublished
    ,Target.DocumentType
    ,Target.SecurityClassification
    ,Target.SourceSystem
    ,Target.Origin
    ,Target.Owner
    ,Target.Author
    ,Target.Representative
    ,Target.Description 
    ,Target.Stage 
    ,Target.Filter1
    ,Target.Filter2
    ,Target.Migrated
    ,Target. ODTSourceSystem
    ,Target.SourceSystemID
    ,Target.IngestionDate
    ,date_sub(to_timestamp(standard.expected_from),1) AS ValidTo
    ,Target.RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'N' AS IsActive
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS source_system
    INNER JOIN Latest
        ON source_system.Description = "DocumentTree"
        AND source_system.IsActive = 'Y'
    INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data AS standard
        ON Latest.LatestDate = standard.ingested_datetime
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AS Target
        ON standard.documentID = Target.documentID
        AND standard.Version = Target.Version
        AND standard.Mime = Target.Mime
        AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(standard.documentid,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.caseref,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documentreference,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.version,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.examinationrefno,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filename,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.originalfilename,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.size,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.mime,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documenturi,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.path,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filemd5,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.datecreated,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.lastmodified,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.casetype,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documentstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.redactedstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.publishedstatus,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.datepublished,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.documenttype,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.securityclassification,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.sourcesystem,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.origin,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.owner,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.author,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.representative,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.description,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.stage	,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filter1,'.'),
                    IFNULL(standard.filter2,'.')
                )) <> Target.RowID

# View aie_document_data_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AS Target
USING aie_document_data_input AS Source
    ON Source.DocumentID = Target.DocumentID 
    AND Source.Version = Target.Version 
    AND Source.Mime = Target.Mime 
    AND Source.RowID = Target.RowID
-- For Updates existing rows
WHEN MATCHED THEN 
    UPDATE 
    SET
        Target.ValidTo = Source.ValidTo,
        Target.IsActive = Source.IsActive
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        AIEDocumentDataID,
        DocumentID,
        CaseReference,
        DocumentReference,
        Version,
        ExaminationRefNo,
        FileName,
        OriginalFileName,
        Size,
        Mime,
        DocumentURI,
        Path,
        VirusCheckStatus,
        FileMD5,
        DateCreated,
        LastModified,
        CaseType,
        DocumentStatus,
        RedactedStatus,
        PublishedStatus,
        DatePublished,
        DocumentType,
        SecurityClassification,
        SourceSystem,
        Origin,
        Owner,
        Author,
        Representative,
        Description,
        Stage,
        Filter1,
        Filter2,
        Migrated,
        ODTSourceSystem,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.AIEDocumentDataID,
        Source.DocumentID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.DocumentReference,
        Source.Version,
        Source.ExaminationRefNo,
        Source.FileName,
        Source.OriginalFileName,
        Source.Size,
        Source.Mime,
        Source.DocumentURI,
        Source.Path,
        Source.VirusCheckStatus,
        Source.FileMD5,
        Source.DateCreated,
        Source.LastModified,
        Source.CaseType,
        Source.DocumentStatus,
        Source.RedactedStatus,
        Source.PublishedStatus,
        Source.DatePublished,
        Source.DocumentType,
        Source.SecurityClassification,
        Source.SourceSystem,
        Source.Origin,
        Source.Owner,
        Source.Author,
        Source.Representative,
        Source.Description,
        Source.Stage,
        Source.Filter1,
        Source.Filter2,
        Source.Migrated,
        Source.ODTSourceSystem,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new aie_document_data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AIEDocumentDataID NULLS LAST) AS AIEDocumentDataID,
    DocumentID,
    CaseReference,
    DocumentReference,
    Version,
    ExaminationRefNo,
    FileName,
    OriginalFileName,
    Size,
    Mime,
    DocumentURI,
    Path,
    VirusCheckStatus,
    FileMD5,
    DateCreated,
    LastModified,
    CaseType,
    DocumentStatus,
    RedactedStatus,
    PublishedStatus,
    DatePublished,
    DocumentType,
    SecurityClassification,
    SourceSystem,
    Origin,
    Owner,
    Author,
    Representative,
    Description,
    Stage,
    Filter1,
    Filter2,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data;
